participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

fmri_postqc_regt1.Description: Registration error score (0=good registration, 1=mild rotation or translation, 2=moderate rotation or translation, 3=severe rotation or translation)

fmri_postqc_b0warp.Description: Residual distortion score (0=no distortion, 1=mild distortion, 2=moderate distortion, 3=severe distortion)

fmri_postqc_imgqual.Description: Image quality score (0=good image quality, 1=mild artifact, 2=moderate artifact, 3=severe artifact)

fmri_postqc_cutoff.Description: Cutoff score (0=no cutoff, 1=mild cutoff, 2=moderate cutoff, 3=severe cutoff)
